content: @Gino Canessa are you interested in having a joint break out with Alerts at the CMS Connectathon... topics -- triggers? messaging channel? general alignment?
Hi Eric, sure. I'm trying to get caught up on the ballot draft of alerts (among other things), so will hopefully be able to have some good discussion.
For everyone interested, we've settled on 2:00 eastern for this.

way back when I put together https://github.com/CareEvolution/Public/blob/master/Subscriptions.md - that is basically a description of our current subscription system translated in FHIR terms. Note how 'what you can subscribe to' include associated specific data, that is NOT a graph of FHIR resources
